thread.title: 6 Eye Make-Up Looks For Every Occasion, This Week
thread.title_full: 6 Eye Make-Up Looks For Every Occasion, This Week

title: 6 Eye Make-Up Looks For Every Occasion, This Week
text:
Prev Next As make-up lovers, one of our favourite things to do is experiment with different looks. While our laziness does tend to come in the way sometimes, we’re always scouring social media feeds and Pinterest for some interesting ideas, especially for eye make-up. To help you out this week, we suggest six eye make-up looks for you to try, for various occasions. 
For college or work 
While all kinds of vibrant coloured eye make-up is blowing up right now, simple black eyeliner on upper and lower eyelids will never go out of style. 
For dinner and a movie 
You can never go wrong with blue. 
For meeting your girls over lunch 
The Mean Girls “On Wednesdays we wear pink” mantra has gone beyond just clothes in 2017. 
For a date with your boo 
Glossy eyelids are so in right now, and are easier to achieve than you would think. 
For those weekend night outs 
Glitter all night, every night, is our life aesthetic. 
For Sunday brunch with your family 
Just a hint of peach is perfect for your Sunday mood. Follow @iDivaOfficial This is dummy error meassage
